meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neurotoxic.
meanings.sent1: The neurotoxicities of the chemical were evident in the lab results.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the neurotoxicities of different substances on the brain.
meanings.sent3: The neurotoxicities of the new medication made the mice dance uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The neurotoxicities of stress can be compared to a storm wreaking havoc on the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: The neurotoxicities of the venom were like tiny assassins attacking the nerves.

meanings.definition: The harmful effects on the nervous system caused by exposure to toxic substances.
meanings.sent1: Doctors monitored the patient for signs of neurotoxicities after the chemical spill.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to lead can result in severe neurotoxicities over time.
meanings.sent3: The neurotoxicities from the fumes turned the office into a circus of confused neurons.
meanings.sent4: The neurotoxicities of the situation were like a silent intruder damaging the nerves.
meanings.sent5: The neurotoxicities of the poison were a silent threat lurking in the shadows of the nervous system.
